definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

pinyin: yuan2 zi3 bao4 po4 dan4 yao4

sentences.english: Such rifles could not be loaded as rapidly as smoothbore muskets.
sentences.chinese: 它们不能像无膛线步枪那样迅速填装弹药。

sentences.english: The armored bring along and ammo box to support him and his allies.
sentences.chinese: 携带弹药箱支援他和他的盟友。

sentences.english: After Thanatos is dead, the team can move on to blow immortals in order to save ammo.
sentences.chinese: 大蓝死后，队伍可以继续炸绿僵尸以节省弹药。

sentences.english: Musette bag with ammo, my webbing, my. 45, canteen…
sentences.chinese: 携物袋加预备弹药，我的伪装网，45手枪，水壶。

sentences.english: Any arms， munitions, living plants, or animals?
sentences.chinese: 有武器弹药和活的动植物吗？

sentences.english: Chinese ammunitions enterprises regularly attend the Santiago Air Show every two years.
sentences.chinese: 中国弹药企业每两年一次定期参加圣地亚哥航空展。

sentences.english: The more carried ammunition, the longer to fire.
sentences.chinese: 弹药携行量越大，最大可射击时间越长。

sentences.english: Support players will deplete ammunition quickly, and will need the rifleman class to resupply them.
sentences.chinese: 支援兵的弹药消耗很快，需要突击兵来补给他们。

sentences.english: Ammunition must be tested using the competitor's firearm.
sentences.chinese: 弹药必须使用选手的枪枝来做测试。

sentences.english: The mining of pine vine has led to the lack of genuine ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 对松类藤索的开采导致了真弹药的缺乏。

sentences.english: The principle and merits of which thermite is used for combustion destruction of ammunition are expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了高热剂燃烧销毁弹药的原理和优点。

sentences.english: Additional ammunition carried in the ship's main magazines.
sentences.chinese: 额外的弹药船载的主要杂志。

sentences.english: The engineer bring along and ammo box to support him and his allies.
sentences.chinese: 工程师携带弹药箱支援他和他的盟友。

sentences.english: Ammunition is used for resupplying units.
sentences.chinese: 弹药被用来补给作战单位。

sentences.english: The problem of "four capabilities" must be solved as soon as possible in the corrent industry of the ammunition.
sentences.chinese: “四性”问题已成为通用弹药行业急待解决的问题。

sentences.english: A small health kit and a medium ammo crate can be found at the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 一个小补血包及小弹药包可以从楼梯旁找到。
